name: Judy and the Chaotic Mess
description:
Guide sweet Judy through the maze to retrieve sound discs. In the center of the maze, insert the discs into the machines to playback and distort the sounds to your heart's content.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Spacebar: Interact (Play/Stop)
  • Number keys 1-5: Place disc into machine
  • X: Remove disc from machine

A game made by Murdoch Longcoat (ig:@choasblast03) and Caity Nitahara, with help from Yann Seznec.
